aliensmeta.name: Zorgath
aliensmeta.testimony: I ain't no threat to nobody, boss. I'm just a peaceful alien tryna coexist with y'all.

aliensmeta.name: Xenthor-Omega
aliensmeta.testimony: I didn't do nothing wrong, I was just flexing my skills and they hatin' on me.

aliensmeta.name: Ullian 00-11Z
aliensmeta.testimony: They locked me up for no reason, I'm just a baller trying to get paid.

aliensmeta.name: Thorgon
aliensmeta.testimony: I'm innocent, I swear it on my momma's grave. They got the wrong Arcturian, I was just living my life.

aliensmeta.name: Vy'keen
aliensmeta.testimony: You got the wrong Zeta, homes. I ain't done nothin' to nobody, I swear on my mothership.

aliensmeta.name: Wrygon
aliensmeta.testimony: Yo, I ain't done nothin' wrong, dawg. I was just passin' through, tryna find my way back home.

aliensmeta.name: Kroxon
aliensmeta.testimony: I'm just tryna find my way back home, you feel me?

aliensmeta.name: Tythor Qoppa
aliensmeta.testimony: They say I'm a danger to society, but I'm just a player trying to shine in this game of life.
